DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate visual performance DAILIES® Aqua Comfort Plus® ( DACP ) MF contact lens use new objective measurement .
DOC.brief_title: DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® Multifocal ( MF ) - Comparative Assessment Visual Performance
DOC.detailed_description: In 3-treatment , 3-period , 6-sequence crossover study , subject receive 3 product randomize order use 1 product time duration 5±1 day switch next assigned product .
DOC.criteria: History soft contact lens wear ( hydrogel silicone hydrogel ) eye past 3 month able wear lens least 8 hour day , 5 day week Spectacle add +1.50 +2.50 diopter ( D ) ( inclusive ) Requiring lens within power range study contact lenses fit Cylinder , present , less equal 0.50D eye Visit 1 Vision correctable 20/30 ( 0.2 logMAR ) good eye distance Acceptable fit study contact lenses Willing wear lens every day least minimum 5 day per week 6 hour per day , every day possible Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply Current multifocal contact lens wearer Current monovision wearer fail attempt monovision Ocular anterior segment infection , inflammation , abnormality , active disease would contraindicate contact lens wear Use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate determined investigator Eye injury surgery within 12 week immediately prior enrollment trial Any moderate severe ocular condition observe slitlamp examination enrollment visit History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery irregular cornea Prior refractive surgery ( e.g . LASIK , PRK , etc ) Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens Habitually uncorrected anisometropia > 2.00D Clinically significant anisocoria Participation clinical trial within 30 day enrollment visit Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply
